title: Littleton Hospital Welcomes 1st Newborn Of 2024 | Local News | caledonianrecord.com
text: [] Littleton Hospital Welcomes 1st Newborn Of 2024 As featured on LITTLETON, N.H. — Littleton Regional Healthcare joyously announced Amaya Rose Gooden was born on January 3, 2024, at 1:43 a.m. Weighing six pounds 14 ounces and measuring 20 inches in length, Amaya was the first baby born at Littleton Regional Healthcare’s Sauter Birthing Suite in the New Year. Dr. Eric Siegel was the physician who attended Amaya’s delivery with the assistance of LRH’s obstetric nursing staff. Post a comment as anonymous Report Watch this discussion.
